title: Origins
description: Before there was Rorie…Before there was Zella…There was One.She was exiled to Earth only to become a tortured prisoner. But there was something her captors didn’t count on. When One became Zella, the nightmare began.Made of light…Paxton rescued her from the depths of the fortress, and Syler freed her from its walls. By day Zella explored her vibrant new world, but at night she was plagued by visions of another life.Tempted by darkness…Return to Atlantis before its demise and discover the origins of the storm. Will Zella survive its watery ruin, or will she be drawn into the deep?
author: Ellie M. Jalbert
